text:
We are trying to submit an app for review on HubSpot marketplace. But, it shows the below alert message while submitting. Would u pls guide us further?
App link: <https://app.HubSpot.com/marketplace-providers/8599006/apps/1753/info>
HubSpot - Looking into the setup for “Minimum 3 installs”
could you please explain Minimum 3 installs

Hi team,
Urgent help for "Filtering HubDB elements with HTML Checkboxes". how's this possible in HubSpot where user can filter the post by selecting multiple checkboxes. like this
Posts can't have multiple topics selected at the same time
if we add the tags and sort the result using tags, then is it possible?

Hi, All.  We are running into some issues with our externally hosted forms (linked from social media/containing utms) being submitted via API and the _new contact_ being created not being attributed to the _Paid Social_ channel in HubSpot analytics.  The cookie is definitely being passed with the form submission as we are not longer seeing that being indicated when viewing the form submission details in HubSpot.  Sessions are created under _Paid Social_ channel, but the contact created is not being attributed.

Any direction here, even to a more appropriate channel, would be greatly appreciated.
